3329.HK.summary: BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides securities and related financial services in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company operates through Brokerage, Corporate Finance and Underwriting, Asset Management and Advisory, Margin Financing, and Investment and Loans segments. The Brokerage segment trades in stocks, bonds, futures, options, and other marketable securities. The Corporate Finance and Underwriting segment provides corporate finance services, including equity underwriting, debt underwriting, sponsor services, and financial advisory services to institutional clients. The Asset Management and Advisory segment offers traditional asset management products and services to third party clients; and investment advisory, portfolio management, and transaction execution services. The Margin Financing segment provides securities-backed financial leverage for retail and institutional clients. The Investment and Loans segment engages in direct investment business, including investments in various debt and equity securities, investment in companies, and investment in loans. The company was formerly known as BOCOM Securities Company Limited and changed its name to BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited in May 2007. BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. BOCOM International Holdings Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Bank of Communications Co., Ltd.

3623.HK.long_name: China Success Finance Group Holdings Limited
3623.HK.summary: China Success Finance Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial and non-financial guarantee, financial leasing, and financial consultancy services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers financial guarantees, such as corporate financial, individual credit, financial leasing equipment, trusteeship, joint bond, corporate bond issuance, non-financing, and performance guarantees, as well as letter of guarantee for construction, and financing/financial consultancy and financial technology services. It also provides asset management services, including investment and financing management, asset/debt restructuring, special asset acquisition, corporate financial management, and financial consultancy services. In addition, the company offers fund management services for asset management, investment advisories, and private equity funds; investment and acquisition; capital; real estate finance; and micro credit services. Further, it provides financial leasing services comprising direct leasing, sale-leaseback, trusted leasing, joint leasing, and bank factoring. China Success Finance Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

YUIA.F.summary: Planetree International Development Limited, an investment holding company, engages in treasury management, financial, and money lending businesses in Hong Kong. The company is involved in trading and holding debt and equity securities; financing and securities investment activities; property leasing; dealing in futures contracts; and securities investment activities. It also offers corporate management services; securities brokerage and financial services; and asset management services. The company was formerly known as Yugang International Limited and changed its name to Planetree International Development Limited in July 2019. Planetree International Development Limited is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong.
